messages.msgSnippet: ... Thanks Melodie, I needed that.  :-)  You re right of course.  as far as I m concerned anyhow! Nanci K. ... Show off your pagan (and Idaho) pride, get Idaho
messages.messageBody:
>Now I feel a little left out! I (and my husband) have always thought that Sex belongs in the kitchen, on the trampoline, out in the pasture, in the hayloft, or where ever the mood strikes!
>Melodie (smiling)
>

Thanks Melodie, I needed that. :-) You're right of course. as far as I'm concerned anyhow!

Nanci K.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] re: was scouts--changed to just the bedroom!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 00-09-28 22:55:14 EDT, you write:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 00-09-28 22:55:14 EDT, you write:

<< Now I feel a little left out! I (and my husband) have always thought that
Sex belongs in the kitchen, on the trampoline, out in the pasture, in the
hayloft, or where ever the mood strikes! Where is that independent,
adventurous side that all unschoolers must have?! >>

Perverts! I hope you're not scout leaders.
On the other hand, if your kids were to become scouts, they'd be off at
meetings and you'd have the whole farm to yourselves!

We have some very nice stairs in our house, and sometimes the kids are gone.

I can say no more.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] re: was scouts--changed to just the bedroom!
messages.msgSnippet: Lynda, Now I feel a little left out!  I (and my husband) have always thought that Sex belongs in the kitchen, on the trampoline, out in the pasture, in the
messages.messageBody:
Lynda,

Now I feel a little left out! I (and my husband) have always thought that
Sex belongs in the kitchen, on the trampoline, out in the pasture, in the
hayloft, or where ever the mood strikes! Where is that independent,
adventurous side that all unschoolers must have?!

No flames please-----this is meant to be "tongue-in-check!" but also pretty
factual.

Melodie (smiling)


-----Original Message-----
From: Lynda <lurine@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Date: Thursday, September 28, 2000 7:43 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] re: scouts


> Sex belongs in the bedroom, period!"
>
>Lynda
